page.title: 18Keynsham Hospital Fete
page.content: The building that is now{Keynsham {Hospital}was originally the Poor House.It was built in 1837.At that time about one quarter of the population were paupers.Now it is a hospital for old people.There is also a maternity unit. Every year a fete is held on the 2nd Saturday in June to raise money.An annual fete has been held for 21 years .It is organised by the League of Friends.On average Â£2000 is raised and the money is used for amenities for the patients and staff.About 1500 people attend the fete.Organisations who help at the fete include Wellsway School,Woman's Institute,Towns-Woman's Guild,Roundtablers,Rotary Club,St.John 's Church and Queen's Road Church. Different stalls include cakes,the Punch & Judy,plants,handicrafts;a dancing display and a band.
